docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, Sept. 5 --Costa Rica has offered to lease Cocos Island, 400 miles off the Pacific Coast, to the United States for the establishment of air and naval bases to guard the western approaches to the Panama Canal, President Rafael A....
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, Sept. 5 --Costa Rica has offered to lease Cocos Island, 400 miles off the Pacific Coast, to the United States for the establishment of air and naval bases to guard the western approaches to the Panama Canal, President Rafael A. Calderon Guardia said today.
